skills.description: Detects AI-generated text patterns and rewrites content to sound more natural and human-written. Useful for editing drafts, improving readability, and reducing robotic tone in AI-assisted writing.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Summarizes long text into concise bullet points or a short paragraph. Works with articles, documents, meeting notes, or any lengthy content. No external API required — uses simple extractive summarization.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Translates text between languages using the OpenAI API. Supports any language pair that GPT models can handle. Provide the target language and text as input.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Delegate tasks to specialized AI agents via PayToll's agent marketplace. Search for agents, create tasks, fund escrow, and retrieve results — all with x402 micropayments on Base.
skills.author: eigenskills
